title: Smash the Four Riders!
giverName: Wenn Wuzzit - Venture League Time Traveler
returnToName: Wenn Wuzzit - Venture League Time Traveler
description: Travel back in time and win the Battle of Nimbus Station so that we may thrive today!
objective: Travel back in time and smash the Four Riders of the Maelstrom in the Battle of Nimbus Station.
